# FreeDeepL
A permanent unlimited free DeepL translation

## Usage
```bash
pip install FreeDeepL
```

```python
from FreeDeepL import FreeDeepL
text = FreeDeepL.translate("Hello, world", "EN", "ZH")
print(text)
```
`Hello, world`: original text. (Required)
`EN`: soource language. (Optional)
`ZH`: target language. (Required)
